channel.title: Millebornes on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Millebornes on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Millebornes
item.description: A relaxing evening game with Miss Me. Always reminds me of Kitta mama, the grand old man with a fiery purpose who introduced us to this game and almost all other board games we’ve played as kids during the scorching summer breaks.
